titles: An historical account of the antiquity and unity of the Britanick churches continued from the conversion of these islands to the Christian faith by St. Augustine, to this present time / by a presbyter of the Church of England.
author: Grascome, Samuel, 1641-1708?
notes: "The epistle to the reader" signed: S.G.
Attributed to Samuel Grascome. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
